welcome_message_body: Welcome to East Orange, a charming city known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Teterboro Airport is exclusively for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Linden Airport.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and chartered flights at Linden Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at JFK, primarily used by international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A small terminal used by Delta Air Lines for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at JFK, used by many international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: A modern terminal used by JetBlue Airways for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: A medium-sized terminal used by British Airways and other international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: A large terminal used by American Airlines for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited connectivity in some areas.
